tool_description: This API provides you with a large amount of interesting random facts and trivia. Get random trivia or search facts by a specific keyword.
name: Trivia - Knowledge - Facts
title: Trivia - Knowledge - Facts

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search facts / trivia about a certain topic

required_parameters.name: topic
required_parameters.description: A topic that must be mentioned in the facts.

api_list.name: Random
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webknox-trivia-knowledge-facts-v1.p.rapidapi.com/trivia/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webknox-trivia-knowledge-facts-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://webknox-trivia-knowledge-facts-v1.p.rapidapi.com/trivia/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webknox-trivia-knowledge-facts-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
